body.p: {{tp341|Your task is to select the correct answers based on the initial listening. We recommend to proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli341|First, go through all the tasks and the offered options.}}
{{tli342|Then, play the recording and try to capture the information concerning the individual issues. When listening, you can simultaneously mark the correct answers.}}
{{tli343|To choose the correct answer left click the selected option.}}
{{tli344|If you wish to change your selection, click another option.}}
{{tli345|If you do not capture all the information, you can listen to the recording repeatedly.}}
{{tli346|Playing sound can be interrupted anytime by clicking Pause button and then continued by clicking Play button.}}
{{tli347|Recording can be played from any place you choose. By clicking recording indicator specify the point from which you wish to start playing. Then click Play button.}}
